sentences.en: "A deal!" she said contemptuously, "I hate all deals."
sentences.cn: “交易！”她鄙夷地说，“我厌恶一切交易。”

sentences.en: Her use of the word hate sounded strange and out of place.
sentences.cn: 她用憎恨一词听起来怪怪的，不合时宜。

sentences.en: I hate having builders botch up repairs on my house.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意让维修工人把我的房子弄得一团糟.

sentences.en: I hate it when people accuse us of that.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌别人就那件事指责我们。

sentences.en: I hate Lewis and his kind just as much as you do.
sentences.cn: 我和你一样痛恨刘易斯之流。

sentences.en: I hate to admit it, but you were right.
sentences.cn: 我不得不承认，你是对的。

sentences.en: I hate to be the bearer of bad news.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌告诉别人坏消息。

sentences.en: I hate to tell you this, but tomorrow's your last day.
sentences.cn: 我很抱歉地通知你，明天是你的最后一天了。

sentences.en: I just hate to see you doing this to yourself.
sentences.cn: 我真不愿意看到你这样对待自己。

sentences.en: I like to keep going. I hate to sit still.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢一直有事情做，讨厌一动不动地坐着。

sentences.en: I was 17 and filled with a lot of hate.
sentences.cn: 我那时17岁,怀着满腔仇恨.

sentences.en: I would hate him to think I'm trying to trap him.
sentences.cn: 我不愿让他以为我是在给他设圈套。

sentences.en: It’s the kind of movie you either love or hate.
sentences.cn: 这是那种你要么喜欢要么讨厌的电影。

sentences.en: Much as I hate to go, it's now or never.
sentences.cn: 虽然我很讨厌去，但也就此一回了。

sentences.en: The media has waged a virulent hate campaign against her.
sentences.cn: 新闻界向她发起了恶毒攻击。

sentences.en: They may hate what he does but their survival depends on him.
sentences.cn: 他们或许讨厌他的营生，但他们要想活下来必须依靠他。

sentences.en: Why do you hate me so much?

words.tran_cn: 煽起仇恨者；煽动仇恨情绪者

phrases.tran_cn: n. 仇恨犯罪；憎恨犯罪
不喜欢做某事；讨厌做某事；与生俱来厌恶

trans.tran_en: an angry unpleasant feeling that someone has when they hate someone and want to harm them
